summary:
Mead, also known as honey wine, is an old alcoholic drink made from fermenting honey and water. It can have different flavors, from sweet to dry, and can be still or fizzy. The alcohol content can vary greatly. You can add fruits or spices to mead, creating different types. For example, mead with fruits is called melomel.

People have made mead for thousands of years in many places like Europe, Africa, and Asia. It even has a special place in some ancient stories and myths.
title: Mead
